page.title: 02Christ the King Playgroup
page.content: The{playgroup}is held each morning 9.15a.m.to 12 noon in the{village hall and{Scout hall}and on two afternoons 12.30 to 2.30 p.m. in the Scout hall.A rota of 3 supervisors and 12 helpers care for the children aged 3-5 years.There are 115 on roll, with no more than 24 at each session. Parents are encouraged to stay with the child until he/ she is ready to be left alone. At Playgroup the children learn to play with other children , trust new adults,listen to stories, use language,express themselves in all sorts of ways and experiment with all sorts of things, work things out and do things for themselves.They enjoy creative play with a variety of materials.Children gain in skill and understanding and are prepared for the world of the 'big school'.
